messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yo, I'm the Acting Captain, And I think we can afford some fun, Maybe DnD?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Chemist tried to break into Cap's Office and steal the disk, But Lil' Ol' Me secured the disk, Hehe.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The Chemist is a confirmed traitor, He commited many capital crimes already, I authorize beating his ass to crit.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The Traitor is dead, I executed him for trying to murder me. I want to thank Kayla for being a good shitcurity

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Revenant, Did you kill the Clown? I expect you to come to my office.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Clown was already dead, Revenant just wanted to eat him, Do not hurt the clown.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: I believe ai is rogue, subverted or malf, as it bolted down telecomms and is generally being shady as fuck

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Cargo Bay.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Data theft signal detected, source registered on local gps units.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I haven't been the best Leader, I feel like I've let you all down, I'm deeply sorry, I am giving the role of Captain to Kayla Moore.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
